benchmark_details.name: VITA (Virtual Teaching Assistants)
benchmark_details.overview: VITA is an adaptive distributed learning platform that embeds a large language model-powered chatbot (BotCaptain) to provide dialogic support, interoperable analytics, and integrity-aware assessment for workforce preparation in data science.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance data science education through adaptive, personalized learning experiences powered by AI.

data.source: Utilizes chat logs and experience API (xAPI) statements from student interactions within the VITA platform.
data.annotation: Data is automatically generated and transformed from chat logs into xAPI statements.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are derived from analyzing student interactions and performance within the VITA platform.
methodology.interpretation: Assessing the quality and quantity of student engagement as well as comprehension improvements.
methodology.validation: The system continuously monitors interactions and adjusts learning pathways based on student performance.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The platform implements measures to ensure students' data privacy and confidentiality.
